modName: Lost armor and weapons of Skyrim
summary: A mod that makes unplayable, or extremely rare armor playable. It also adds equipable bound weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=6]Lost Armors and Weapons of Skyrim
[/size]
[size=2]NOTE: THE BOUND WEAPONS [/size][size=3]WILL [/size][size=2]DISAPPEAR IF YOU UNEQUIP OR DROP THEM! YOU [/size][size=3]MUST [/size][size=2]EQUIP SOMETHING OVER THEM IN ORDER TO KEEP THEM IN YOUR INVENTORY!
[/size][/font][/center]So I thought it was about time to update this mod. 

If you're new to this mod, my aim is to basically make every possible unplayable or rare armor, clothing, or weapon in Skyrim easily accessible. I've done this by adding all of the items into the back room of Warmaidens in a large coffin, and on some tables. You can unlock the chest by getting Ulfberth's house key. Either pickpocket him or kill him for it. If everything comes up as stolen, just use the console command "setownership" and you should be able to take everything without getting in trouble. 

[size=4]Here's a list of what I've added with this mod:
[/size] - Executioner's Armor
 - Equipable Bound Weapons (Battleaxe, swords, and a bow. I could not get the arrows to work properly. Sorry.)
 - Dremora Armor Set (Basically just Daedric Armor, only you can now take it off the corpses of Dremora. I also gave the armor half stats, and half value and made it light armor.)
 - Giant's Club
 - Various Thieve's Guild Variant Armors
 - Karliah's Armor (Female only)
 - Summerset Shadow's Armor (Basically just thieve's guild armor)
 - Mercer Frey's Armor set (Guildmaster's armor. Only now you can loot it off of him)
 - Nocturnal's Robes and hood (Female only)
 - Tsun's armor and boots
 - Psyjiic Robes
 - Various Jarl Clothing
 - Green Tropical-Looking Robes
 - Red and White Robes
 - Grey Robes
 - Gilded Wristguards
 - Short-Sleeved Shrouded Armor
 - Child Clothes (If you decide to play as a child)
 - Arm Bandages
 - Ulfric's Gag

If you have the previous version of this mod already installed, delete (playable_armors) and drop the new file in.
Thank you for your download.
author: Ronin
